Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed (fired dark brown) with frieze of short vertical strokes in added white between white and added red bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx standing to left (part of dotted wing, tresses with red, body with red dots and forelegs with red remaining); below, part of elaborate rosette and other filling ornament.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.

The sherd joins British Museum 1888,0601.465.a and Louvre E8056 bis.22 and belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.465.b, 1888,0601.465.c, 1888,0601.465.d, 1888,0601.465.e, 1924,1201.537 and London UCL 751 and UCL 393. Also British Museum 1965,0930.338 probably belongs to the same vase. Fairbanks describes the sherd as coming from a krater. Lemos describes the sherd as coming from a mediocre, but very big chalice belonging to the Group of Elaborate Animal Chalices. Chalices that fall into this group are usually large and heavy-walled and are also known as chalice-kraters. Chalices in this group display elaborate compositions that include polychromy and delicately painted figures (Lemos 1991, 90-1).
Bibliographic references: Fairbanks 1928 / Early Vases preceding Athenian Black Figure Ware (p. 99, pl. XXXII, no. 302.7)
Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 90, p. 266, no. 582, pl. 73)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1603) (phase 2)
Robinson 1893 / Catalogue of Greek, Etruscan and Roman Vases (p. 210, no. 7)
Previous owner: Currently owned by: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.5729 (Pottery & Porcelain Ledger No.)
